reviews.review: Que haces mirando las reseñas? Compralo ya

Una mierda, esta bien que no te corra ningun juego bueno pero no digas que este juego es el mejor porque es todo lo contrario

游戏的流程短小，仅仅只有5个小节，游玩下来大概就是3个小时左右
剧情就是延续半条命2的
V社完全可以把第一章和第二章合在一起当作3的，但是并没有

环境以及氛围的塑造简直一绝

游戏里面也有一些好笑的场景设计以及对话安排
也算是让你在害怕紧张的氛围之中放松一下
所以除了剧情短，其他啥都好。
Episode One is quite shot but I think Alyx is my new waifu
The sleeper of the HL2 series
Good game! Gordon Freeman is amazing

okay i love that underground section, it's one of the high points of the entire hl2 series. while the second half of episode one isn't very memorable, the underground and the hospital combined are a better quality than the entire latter half of hl2.
i wish it was longer but its still very good
this should be free honestly dont buy this garbage
I wasn't sure if i was going to like the game at first but after beating the game i felt like the game was a Short and sweet adventure really, but really, really enjoyable.
Коротко чуть-чуть, но в целом хорошо

It’s an Expansion pack of the Half Life 2 game. The story continues where the main game ended and you’re escaping the Citadel. You’re finding the way in darkness in the beginning, which I consider as the spiciest part. Then, you’re fighting your way in a parking house, in a basement, in apartments, in the streets, in a hospital and at a train station. The very ending is quite hard if you have low health. 

Enjoy!
小时候在网吧玩了一部分就被吸引了，如今有了笔记本电脑把游戏通关了，感觉针不戳

Neden bilmiyorum ama çok gerdi beni bu oyun. Gordon'u yönetiyor, Alyx ile birlikte ilerliyor, düşmanlarla çarpışıyoruz. Sanırım Alyx'i korumam gerektiği düşüncesiydi beni geren. Neyse ki partnerimizin cephanesi hiç tükenmiyor ve yanında bomba neyin patlamadığı sürece ölmüyor. Ölürse zaten biz ölmüş gibi oluyor ve son kaydedilen yerden birlikte başlıyoruz. Bir zaman sonra bir baktım ben kızın arkasına saklanıyorum. Bunun bir sebebi de hatırı sayılır bir süre boyunca doğru düzgün silahlara ve cephaneye erişimimizin olmaması. El feneri ile ilerlememiz gereken, karanlık yerler gerçekten ürkünç. Fakat ondan da ürkünç olan; Alyx'in, zombi taklidi yapmak da dahil olmak üzere oyun boyunca ardı ardına patlattığı espriler :)) Yer yer bulmacaların zorladığı; keyifli, heyecanlı ve gerilimli bir oyun hl2e1.

Half-Life 2 Episode One - 8.50/10 (I rate 5/10 as average)

Graphics: 5.0/10
Sound Design: 10.0/10
Soundtrack: 5.5/10
Plot: 7.8/10
Dialogue: 9.5/10
Gameplay: 9.0/10
Setting: 8.0/10

Graphics: 
I can't hold the graphics against this game as it came out in 2004. However, for 2004, these graphics were astounding. A 5/10 is average graphics. 

Sound Design: 
I can astutely tell what is going on around me in each level. It is very clear, with each enemy having a distinct sound, each gun having a distinct sound. It makes it very clear to know which enemy is coming so you can handle it. 

Soundtrack:
This soundtrack is good and amplifies the game, but I only really remember one score from it. 

Plot/Dialogue:
The plot isn't as strong as the original, but it is still good. It's a simple survival story and expands on the universe of Half-Life. The characters have logical intentions, with a logical progression as it goes on. The facial animations are also better than some of the games that have come out as of late, and this game didn't use motion capture. The dialogue is top tier and will get a good chuckle from ya. The ending is also very solid and sets up Episode Two very well.

Gameplay:
The gameplay is definitely one of the selling points of this game. The gunplay is very diverse, with a wide selection of enemies. It really gets you thinking of how to approach the situation. The level design is also extremely well-done, with the game not holding your hand and relying on environmental clues to get you through the mission. It makes the player feel smart, which is great. 

Setting:
While the colors were pretty lackluster, I really did enjoy the dystopia feel. The city feels super desolate and hopeless, which is what I believe the developers were going for. 

Final Notes:
Episode One serves as a great DLC for Half-Life and I highly recommend it those who are fans of the FPS genre and Half-life.

El primero de los episodios de half life 2 se sostiene a si mismo por medio de una reescritura del final original, cambiándolo por completo para dar pie a posteriores continuaciones, lo cual es objetivamente poco o nada inteligente, puesto a que a causa de ello se pone en tela de juicio la sospechosa conveniencia argumental que la obra tiende a padecer. A nivel jugable podría decirse de que es más de los mismo, si no fuera por el hecho de que ahora estamos en compañía constante de alyx, reforzando el sentimiento de cooperación mutua. Sin embargo, a nivel narrativo, la historia apuesta todas sus cartas desde el inicio, haciendo que la trama a posterior tienda a perder valor argumental. Aun así, “Half life 2 episodio uno” sigue conservando el nivel y la calidad de su predecesor, no obstante, es innegable que son contadas las innovaciones que se pueden apreciar; 9,1/10 pese a todo sigue siendo indispensable para poder disfrutar de esta excelente saga.
_Tiene buenas graficas  buena trama y jugabilidad
binged through the first three and a half chapters the first time I sat down with this game.

I mean its Half-Life bro. What did u expect? Of course the games great but honestly it doesn't do much in terms of "Reinventing the Wheel" All it does for me is just continue the story. Which is still pretty good don't get me wrong but other than that it's just "More Half-Life" Still recommend tho

Просто хороший эпизод, продолжающий историю. Малая продолжительность мешает в полной мере оценить его, хотя в любом случае первый эпизод является важной частью сюжета игры, поэтому его никак нельзя пропускать каким бы он ни был.
Very epic game the guns go boom
Not as good as neither HL2 nor Episode Two, but still a solid game.
Kısa ama güzel bir half life oyunu :D

A smaller, bite sized Half Life 2 experience, Alyx is a total badass and is by far one of the best in-game companions I've ever had, super useful, not annoying and easy to keep alive.

Totally recommended!
Обалденное продолжение халфы, абсолютно всё классно, разве-что коротко, для меня лично самая нелюбимая часть второй халфы, но всё-равно, обязательно попробуйте пройти одинокую пулю)
Un juego que sin duda no debe faltar en la biblioteca para un fan de esta clásica serie :)
Weakest one in the series, play if you want to experience the full Half-Life 2 experience, but doesn't stand on it's own.

Decent to good episode, wished it was a bit longer since on your first playthrough you can finish the game in 2-3 hours. It has some cheap enemy placement to kill you and you don't use really a lot of weapons but it's still overall a nice expansion to play but Episode 2>Episode 1. Feeling a decent 7
Amazing continuation of the story and the excitement, couldn't have done it better. 10/10
Still a good game. Though short, it's still a proper Half Life experience and a good follow up to the second game. It's always nice to revisit the old games.
Хорошенькое продолжение, но проходя игру без единого выстрела, не раз убеждаюсь, что Аликс одна из лучших напарниц вообще.

A continuation of one of the best games ever. The episodes like to push the use of the Gravity Gun a bit more and more organically than the main title in a good way, and never forced. I remember being so satisfied when I first played this years ago on the 360, my question was answered about what happens to combine soldiers if they got pecked by Head Crabs. Not very long, although the pacing of everything is still perfect. It's more Half-Life 2 with a slightly more gnawing at the back of your mind about what's going to happen next.
